amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit any of the funds made availabe by the Act from being used to apply the assumption contained in section A150.101(d) of title 14, Code of Federal Regulations.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A047) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
